education.school: S S K LAL A MEM BAL VIDYA MANDIR

projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Developed a fully functional Netflix clone using React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The application features a dynamic and responsive user interface, mirroring Netflix's design and functionality. Integrated various API services to fetch and display real-time movie data.

projects.name: Online Fraud Detection using ML
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using Python, Numpy, Pandas, and Matplotlib to detect online fraud with high accuracy. Conducted extensive data preprocessing and feature engineering to enhance model performance. Implemented various algorithms to identify fraudulent activities, achieving significant detection rates. Visualized results and model metrics using Matplotlib for comprehensive analysis.

projects.name: Page Of Wonder
projects.description: Developed custom APIs for CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on posts/blogs in the 'Page Of Wonder' MERN blog website. Implemented with Node.js and Express.js, ensuring efficient data management and seamless integration with React.js frontend. Incorporated authentication and authorization for secure operations, enhancing user experience and data integrity.

experiences.description: I refined my Android development skills using Java, acquired proficiency in integrating SQL databases, and deepened my understanding of networking and database fundamentals. authentication, payment integration, inbox management, and profile functionality to ensure a seamless user experience.
